# Antonio Almeida

> Product Designer and Developer based in Australia. Eleven years of client delivery, from design through production.

My work starts with figuring out what to build. I've been building products solo with AI — shipping, breaking things, realising the hard decisions happen before the code.

## Site structure

- [Home](https://www.antoniodesign.work/): Overview of work, background, and writing.
- [Projects](https://www.antoniodesign.work/project/): Selected client and product work.
- [Articles](https://www.antoniodesign.work/articles/): Writing on design, product, and building with AI.

## Projects

- Work180: Employer profiles — 275% increase in organic traffic. 100+ employer profiles redesigned.
- POD Combined — 305 users in 2 months. Built solo in 3 weeks. Rebuilt three times before it worked.
- OzHarvest: Annual Report — Three annual reports and counting. Australia's largest food rescue organisation.
- SmileScore: Clinical MVP — 65+ data points on paper. One iPhone, one hand, chair-side.

## Build

- AI Patterns — A catalogue of 16 named AI design patterns and 8 laws.
- aweekend — A quick estimate for the SaaS build-or-replace decision.

## Background

Currently Lead Designer & Developer at Emptyhead Digital, delivering end-to-end for organisations including OzHarvest, Australian Youth Orchestra, and MJ: The Musical. Previously Senior UX Designer at WORK180, Lead Digital Designer & Frontend Developer at ACMN, and Digital Designer at Fairfax Media.
